content: Medium protects the SNOWFLAKES who haven’t a clue on how to recognize a civil conversation or how to turn an uncivil one into a interesting civil one by engaging the other writer with intellect. On the other hand, if you want to insult one of these fools and not go evil Headmistress Trunchbull’s office to be beaten by her trudgen, use metaphors, literary references, and linguistic nastiness to beat them bloody, and display their ignorance[which they doubtless will not understand] to those all around them. Even MEDIUM’S PC police might get a good laugh out of it.
